statements.query: MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSVpc)<-[:ACCEPTER_VPC]-(n:PeeringConnection) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSVpc)<-[:REQUESTER_VPC]-(n:PeeringConnection) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:AWSVpc) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (n:AWSCidrBlock)<-[:BLOCK_ASSOCIATION]-(:AWSVpc)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{foreign: true}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:AWSCidrBlock)<-[r:BLOCK_ASSOCIATION]-(:AWSVpc)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{foreign: true}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (n:AWSVpc)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{foreign: true}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:AWSVpc)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{foreign: true}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:AWSVpc)-[r:VPC_PEERING]-(:AWSVpc) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (n:AWSAccount{foreign: true}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
